altername_name: Quaddle 1/The Case of the Scarce Scarab: "Lobby" and "Kitchen"
name: Quaddle Family Mysteries 1: The Case of the Scarce Scarab: Lobby: Kitchen
overview: Your child is invited inside the fascinating Quaddle Museum to help investigate the case of the missing ancient scarab earring. Solving mathematical puzzles and problems in the museum's various rooms will provide clues to the earring's location. LEARNING OBJECTIVES Read and interpret information in a chart Estimate and add money amounts Use computation and counting skills to make change Measure capacity to complete recipes Relate Fahrenheit and Celsius temperatures to real-world situations Sort items by weight
